Trigger.Name: KEY-NEXT-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 V_TRNO VARCHAR2(100);
 V_CON_TYP VARCHAR2(100);
 V_CHK NUMBER;
 APP NUMBER;
 STATUS NUMBER;
BEGIN
 
 V_TRNO := NAME_IN('ISSUE_NOTE_MT.TRNO');
 IF :ISSUE_NOTE_MT.TRNO IS NOT NULL THEN 
 COPY(V_TRNO , 'P_TRNO');
 --- COPY(V_CON_TYP , 'P_CON_TYP');
 CLEAR_BLOCK(NO_VALIDATE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('ISSUE_NOTE_MT', DEFAULT_WHERE, 'TRNO = :P_TRNO ' );
 GO_BLOCK('ISSUE_NOTE_MT');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 -----------MODIFY--------------
 :STATDS := 'Modify'; 
 GO_BLOCK('ISSUE_NOTE_DET');
 LAST_RECORD;
 
 -- :System.Message_Level := '25';
 -- NEXT_RECORD;
 --:System.Message_Level := '0';
 GO_BLOCK('ISSUE_NOTE_MT'); 
 NEXT_ITEM;
 
 ELSIF :ISSUE_NOTE_MT.TRNO IS NULL THEN 
 -----------NEW ENTRY--------------
 :STATDS :='New Entry';
 --- SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('STAT',ICON_NAME,'newentry24a.png');
 :ISSUE_NOTE_MT.TRNO := NULL;
 
 :DAT := TRUNC(SYSDATE);
 NEXT_ITEM;
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('SAVE',ENABLED)='FALSE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('SAVE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF;
 END IF; 
 GO_BLOCK('ISSUE_NOTE_MT'); 
 GO_ITEM('ALLOC_REF_NO'); 

END;

 THEN

END IF;

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin ISSUE_NOTE_DET detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:ISSUE_NOTE_MT.TRNO is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('ISSUE_NOTE_MT.ISSUE_NOTE_MT_ISSUE_NOTE_DET'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'ISSUE_NOTE_DET'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End ISSUE_NOTE_DET detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: ON-CHECK-DELETE-MASTER
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 Dummy_Define CHAR(1);
 --
 -- Begin ISSUE_NOTE_DET detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR ISSUE_NOTE_DET_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM ISSUE_NOTE_DET I 
 WHERE I.TRNO = :ISSUE_NOTE_MT.TRNO;
 --
 -- End ISSUE_NOTE_DET detail declare section
 --
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin ISSUE_NOTE_DET detail program section
 --
 OPEN ISSUE_NOTE_DET_cur; 
 FETCH ISSUE_NOTE_DET_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( ISSUE_NOTE_DET_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE ISSUE_NOTE_DET_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE ISSUE_NOTE_DET_cur;
 --
 -- End ISSUE_NOTE_DET detail program section
 --
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 SELECT UREF
 INTO :ALLOC_REF_NO
 FROM MP_M M
 WHERE TRNO= :ALLOC;
EXCEPTION WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN NULL;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
--COMMIT_FORM;
IF :QTY > (:ALLOC_QTY-:ISS_QTY) THEN 
 MESSAGE('Qty could not greater then Allocated Qty');
 MESSAGE('Qty could not greater then Allocated Qty');
 GO_BLOCK('MP_D');
 GO_ITEM('QTY');
 --LIST_VALUES;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END IF;


 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL := 25;
 COMMIT_FORM;
 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL:=0;
 MESSAGE('Saved successfully.');
 MESSAGE('Saved successfully.'); 
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('STATDS',ICON_NAME,'modify24a.png');
 --:STATDS :='Modify'; 
 GO_ITEM('CLEAR');
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('SAVE',ENABLED)='TRUE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('SAVE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
REPORT_ID REPORT_OBJECT;
REPORTSERVERJOB VARCHAR2(254);
VJOB_ID VARCHAR2(200);
VC_REP_STATUS VARCHAR2(200);
V_REPORT VARCHAR2(200);
PL_ID PARAMLIST; 
PL_NAME VARCHAR2(20):= 'tempdata';
REPSRV VARCHAR2(100);
APP_SERVER VARCHAR2(100);
P_SHOW VARCHAR2(1000);
USER_ID VARCHAR2(1000);
BEGIN
 /*
 IF :MP_M.TRNO IS NULL THEN
 MESSAGE('ENTER Doc #');
 MESSAGE('ENTER Doc #');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;*
 
 IF :MP_M.TRNO IS NOT NULL THEN
 
 */
BEGIN 
 SELECT USER_NAME INTO USER_ID
 FROM EMPLOYEE_MT EMP
 WHERE EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID = :GLOBAL.GNUM_LOGIN_EMP;
END;

 PL_ID := GET_PARAMETER_LIST(PL_NAME);
 
 IF NOT ID_NULL (PL_ID) THEN
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(PL_ID);
 END IF;
 PL_ID := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST(PL_NAME);
 ADD_PARAMETER(PL_ID,'TRNO',TEXT_PARAMETER,:ISSUE_NOTE_MT.TRNO);
 --add_parameter(pl_id,'EXPIRATION',text_parameter,5); -- To delete output from cache after 5 minutes 
 V_REPORT :='D:\PROJECTS\WIZINV\REPORTS\'||'RPRT_TNA.REP'; -----Mention Report Name Here 
 
 REPORT_ID := FIND_REPORT_OBJECT('MYREPORT'); -----Report Object Name
BEGIN
 SELECT T.APP_SERVER, T.REP_SERVER INTO APP_SERVER,REPSRV
 FROM EMPLOYEE_MT EMP,WIZ_APS_SITES_MT T
 WHERE EMP.SITE_ID = T.SITE_ID
 AND EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID = :GLOBAL.GNUM_LOGIN_EMP;
 END;
 
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(REPORT_ID, REPORT_FILENAME, V_REPORT);
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(REPORT_ID,REPORT_SERVER,REPSRV); 
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(REPORT_ID,REPORT_OTHER,'paramform=no');
 REPORTSERVERJOB := RUN_REPORT_OBJECT(REPORT_ID,PL_ID);
 
 VJOB_ID := SUBSTR(REPORTSERVERJOB,INSTR(REPORTSERVERJOB,'_',-1)+1);
 VC_REP_STATUS := REPORT_OBJECT_STATUS(REPORTSERVERJOB);

 IF VC_REP_STATUS = 'FINISHED' THEN
 P_SHOW := 'http:/'||'reports/rwservlet/getjobid'||VJOB_ID;
 WEB.SHOW_DOCUMENT(P_SHOW);
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('Report failed with error message '|| VC_REP_STATUS);
 END IF; 
 
END;

BEGIN

ProgramUnit.Name: MAX_TRNO
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE MAX_TRNO IS
BEGIN
 SELECT NVL(MAX(TRNO),0)+1 
 INTO :ISSUE_NOTE_MT.TRNO
 FROM ISSUE_NOTE_MT;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: MAX_RNO
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE MAX_RNO IS
BEGIN
 SELECT NVL(MAX(RNO),0)+1 
 INTO :ISSUE_NOTE_DET.RNO
 FROM ISSUE_NOTE_DET;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_PACKAGE_FAILURE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
Procedure Check_Package_Failure IS
BEGIN
 IF NOT ( Form_Success ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: QUERY_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Query_Master_Details(rel_id Relation,detail VARCHAR2) IS
 oldmsg VARCHAR2(2); -- Old Message Level Setting
 reldef VARCHAR2(5); -- Relation Deferred Setting
BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Variable(s)
 --
 reldef := Get_Relation_Property(rel_id, DEFERRED_COORDINATION);
 oldmsg := :System.Message_Level;
 --
 -- If NOT Deferred, Goto detail and execute the query.
 --
 IF reldef = 'FALSE' THEN
 Go_Block(detail);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 :System.Message_Level := '10';
 Execute_Query;
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Relation is deferred, mark the detail block as un-coordinated
 --
 Set_Block_Property(detail, COORDINATION_STATUS, NON_COORDINATED);
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 RAISE;
END Query_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: CLEAR_ALL_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Clear_All_Master_Details IS
 mastblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Initial Master Block Causing Coord
 coordop VARCHAR2(30); -- Operation Causing the Coord
 trigblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Cur Block On-Clear-Details Fires On
 startitm VARCHAR2(61); -- Item in which cursor started
 frmstat VARCHAR2(15); -- Form Status
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 curdtl VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Detail Block

 FUNCTION First_Changed_Block_Below(Master VARCHAR2)
 RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 retblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Return Block
 BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Vars
 --
 curblk := Master;
 currel := Get_Block_Property(curblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 --
 -- While there exists another relation for this block
 --
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 --
 -- Get the name of the detail block
 --
 curblk := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 --
 -- If this block has changes, return its name
 --
 IF ( Get_Block_Property(curblk, STATUS) = 'CHANGED' ) THEN
 RETURN curblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- No changes, recursively look for changed blocks below
 --
 retblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(curblk);
 --
 -- If some block below is changed, return its name
 --
 IF retblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 RETURN retblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Consider the next relation
 --
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- No changed blocks were found
 --
 RETURN NULL;
 END First_Changed_Block_Below;

BEGIN
 --
 -- Init Local Vars
 --
 mastblk := :System.Master_Block;
 coordop := :System.Coordination_Operation;
 trigblk := :System.Trigger_Block;
 startitm := :System.Cursor_Item;
 frmstat := :System.Form_Status;

 --
 -- If the coordination operation is anything but CLEAR_RECORD or
 -- SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS, then continue checking.
 --
 IF coordop NOT IN ('CLEAR_RECORD', 'SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS') THEN
 --
 -- If we're processing the driving master block...
 --
 IF mastblk = trigblk THEN
 --
 -- If something in the form is changed, find the
 -- first changed block below the master
 --
 IF frmstat = 'CHANGED' THEN
 curblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(mastblk);
 --
 -- If we find a changed block below, go there
 -- and Ask to commit the changes.
 --
 IF curblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 Go_Block(curblk);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(ASK_COMMIT);
 --
 -- If user cancels commit dialog, raise error
 --
 IF NOT ( :System.Form_Status = 'QUERY'
 OR :System.Block_Status = 'NEW' ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 --
 -- Clear all the detail blocks for this master without
 -- any further asking to commit.
 --
 currel := Get_Block_Property(trigblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 curdtl := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 IF Get_Block_Property(curdtl, STATUS) <> 'NEW' THEN
 Go_Block(curdtl);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(NO_VALIDATE);
 IF :System.Block_Status <> 'NEW' THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- Put cursor back where it started
 --
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 END IF;
 RAISE;

END Clear_All_Master_Details;

RecordGroup.Name: LOV_DET
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT YCD,
 APPS_VLD.GET_CODE (YCD) ALLOC_YARN_C,
 APPS_VLD.GET_ITM (YCD) ALLOC_YARN,
 SEL_ITEM,
 APPS_VLD.GET_CODE (SEL_ITEM) ALTER_YARN_C,
 APPS_VLD.GET_ITM (SEL_ITEM) ALTER_YARN,
 SUM (QTY),
 APPS_VLD.ISS_QTY(:ALLOC,YCD) ALREADY_ISSUED
 FROM (SELECT YCD, SEL_ITEM, QTY
 FROM MP_M MMM, MP_D MMD
 WHERE 1 = 1
 AND MMM.TRNO = MMD.TRNO
 AND VDC = 1
 AND MMM.TRNO = :ALLOC
 AND POSTED = 1
 AND NVL (QTY, 0) > 0
 UNION ALL
 SELECT YCD, SEL_ITEM, -QTY
 FROM MP_M MM, MP_D MD
 WHERE 1 = 1
 AND MM.TRNO = MD.TRNO
 AND VDC = 2
 AND MM.ATRNO = :ALLOC
 AND POSTED = 1
 AND NVL (QTY, 0) > 0)
 HAVING (SUM (QTY)-APPS_VLD.ISS_QTY(:ALLOC,YCD))>0
GROUP BY YCD, SEL_ITEM

RecordGroup.Name: LOV_ALLOC
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT UREF,
 TRNO,
 SONO,
 APPS_VLD.GET_SOREF (SONO) ORDER_NO
 FROM MP_M M
 WHERE 1 = 1 AND VDC = 1 AND POSTED = 1

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 FLAG BOOLEAN := FALSE;
 AL_MSG VARCHAR2(200);
 AL_ID ALERT := FIND_ALERT('caution_alert');
 AL_BTN NUMBER;
 POQTY NUMBER;
BEGIN
 IF GET_RECORD_PROPERTY(GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('ISSUE_NOTE_MT', CURRENT_RECORD), 'ISSUE_NOTE_MT', STATUS) IN ('NEW', 'INSERT') THEN
 MAX_TRNO;
 
 END IF;
 
IF :SYSTEM.RECORD_STATUS NOT IN ('INSERT', 'CHANGED') THEN
 RETURN;
END IF;

ELSE
 FLAG := TRUE;
END IF;
 IF NOT FLAG THEN
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;*/
END;

Trigger.Name: ON-CLEAR-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 Clear_All_Master_Details;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--
